mapper.select: /* file : MenuMapper.xml, id : getUserMenuList */ SELECT A.* FROM ST_MENU A INNER JOIN ST_MENU_AUTH B ON A.MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE WHERE A.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND B.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND B.AUTH = #{auth} ORDER BY A.ORDBY

/* file : MenuMapper.xml, id : getMenuList */ WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT MENU_CODE , MENU_NAME , PARENT_MENU_CODE , MENU_LINK , 1 AS LEVEL , ORDBY , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM ST_MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_CODE = 'TOP' AND DEL_FLAG = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT M.MENU_CODE , M.MENU_NAME , M.PARENT_MENU_CODE , M.MENU_LINK , 1 + CTE.LEVEL AS LEVEL , M.ORDBY , DATE_FORMAT(M.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM ST_MENU M INNER JOIN CTE ON M.PARENT_MENU_CODE = CTE.MENU_CODE WHERE M.DEL_FLAG = 0 ) SELECT MENU_CODE , MENU_NAME , PARENT_MENU_CODE , MENU_LINK , LEVEL , ORDBY , REG_DT FROM CTE WHERE 1 = 1
AND ${field} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY MENU_CODE /*||ORDER BY MENU_CODE||*/
mapper.insert: /* file : MenuMapper.xml, id : saveAuthMenu */ INSERT INTO ST_MENU_AUTH ( AUTH , MENU_CODE , READ_FLAG , REG_USER_SEQ) VALUES ( #{auth} , #{menu_code} , 1 , #{login_user_seq}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE READ_FLAG = 1 , DEL_FLAG = 0 , MOD_USER_SEQ = #{login_user_seq} , MOD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , DEL_USER_SEQ = NULL , DEL_DATE = NULL
mapper.select: /* file : MenuMapper.xml, id : getAuthMenuParent */ SELECT PARENT_MENU_CODE FROM ( SELECT PARENT_MENU_CODE FROM ST_MENU WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0 AND MENU_CODE IN ( SELECT MENU_CODE FROM ST_MENU_AUTH WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0 AND AUTH = #{auth} ) GROUP BY PARENT_MENU_CODE ) P WHERE PARENT_MENU_CODE != 'TOP'
